Detailed Description

This class is used to instantiate animator XML files into Animator objects.

For performance reasons, inflation relies heavily on pre-processing of XML files that is done at build time. Therefore, it is not currently possible to use this inflater with an XmlPullParser over a plain XML file at runtime; it only works with an XmlPullParser returned from a compiled resource (R. something file.)

 <set gaia:ordering = "sequentially">
  <set>
      <objectAnimator
          gaia:propertyName="x"
          gaia:duration="500"
          gaia:valueTo="400"
          gaia:valueType="intType"
      />
      <objectAnimator
          gaia:propertyName="y"
          gaia:duration="500"
          gaia:valueTo="300"
          gaia:valueType="intType"
       />
  </set>
  <objectAnimator
      gaia:propertyName="alpha"
      gaia:duration="500"
      gaia:valueTo="1f"
   />
 </set>

 AnimatorSet *animator_set = static_cast<AnimatorSet*>(AnimatorInflater::loadAnimatorN(myContext, R::anim::property_animator));
 animator_set->setTarget(myObject);
 animator_set->start();

 delete animator_set;
